description.en: A calm and quiet Agito cadet of Class Zero. Outwardly polite and unassuming、 her reliable character and unwavering conviction has at times been the key to Class Zero's survival. On the field of battle、 she assails her enemies with strains from her flute、 a decidedly unique approach to combat.
description.jp:
おっとりしておだやかな０組のアギト
候補生の少女。丁寧な口調でひかえめな
印象だが しっかり者で 信念は決して
曲げず大人にも負けない芯の強さで
０組の活路を開いたこともあった。
笛を奏でた音塊によって敵を攻撃する
風変わりな戦い方が特徴的。

jp.text: 遊ぶときは思いっきり遊ぶ ですね
まずは お友達になりましょう？
あ いえ あの ただ 必死だっただけで……
！？ な なんで！？\nわたしの言いたいことがわかったんです？
じゃあ これからまず\n何しましょうか？
みんな一緒なら\n10年経っても楽しそうです

gl.text: Whenever you play、 you should play hard!
Wait—let's try to be friends first!
Oh、 um、 no. I was just desperate、 that's all.
How did you know what I was going to say?
What should we do first? Any suggestions?
I'm sure that、 no matter what we do、 it will be great as long as we're together.

desc.en:
Raises party BRV based on Max BRV
Followed by a 6-HIT AoE magic BRV+HP attack
BRV Hits are dispersed when there are multiple enemies
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
HP damage is equally split amongst all enemies
Grants [Note] to all party members for 8 turns
Grants [Fortissimo] for 3 turns

[Fortissimo] has the following effects:
• Raises Attack
• Raises party Max BRV overflow limit
desc.gl:
Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV

「Dissonant Sonata」 use +2

BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV; BRV damage boosted based on party's Note total)
